headline.main: MOSCOW'S ARMY BEATS BACK NAZIS; Drive Above Tula Repelled -- Germans Slowed in Crimea, but Gain in the North

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Tuesday, Nov. 11 -- Savage fighting on the Tula salient of the Moscow front and in Crimea was reported in a Russian communique this morning. Other Soviet sources said that the Germans had failed to break Red Army resistance in those areas and had made little headway.
